title: Acropolis
text: The place is under renovations, but still it's incredible and have a great view of the city and surroundings.

title: Great Museum
text: The museum is built in a way that allows to enjoy the exhibits and the Acropolis. Don't skip the visit.

title: Trip to the Peloponnese
text: Me and my kids went for a trip to Nafplio with Michail. We had a wonderful time and enjoyed the trip very much. Michail was very pleasant, nice and informative. I recommend the trip and using this company. We would definitely use their services when we go back to Athens.
place: Private Day Trip from Athens to Peloponnese & Nafplio

title: Great experience
text: Me and my family did an Athens food tour with Andreas. The tour was great, with explanations of the city, food and history of Athens. Andreas was very nice, very professional and welcoming. we highly recommend this wonderful experience.
place: Athens Food and City Private Walking Tour
